# Fishbone diagram

```{r, warning = F, echo= F }
library(SixSigma)

effect <- "Low Sensitivity"
causes.gr <- c("MS", "LC", "Sample Preparation", "Human Failures")
causes <- vector(mode = "list", length = length(causes.gr))
causes[1] <- list(c("--- ESI", "--- EMV", "--- Ion Source"))
causes[2] <- list(c("--- Column Degration", "--- Contamination", "--- Pressure Traces"))
causes[3] <- list(c("--- Analyte Loss", "--- Washing solvent", "--- eluting solvent"))
causes[4] <- list(c("--- Wrong Injection"))
ss.ceDiag(effect, causes.gr, causes, main = "Sensitivity with LC-MS/MS", sub = "")
```
